name: B.I.S.A Protocol
description:
Our game is a point and click game where the player will play as an AI system on a ship that helps NPC survivors to survive and escape from the zombie outbreak on the ship. The game was initially inspired by Resident Evil 1, 2's fixed cameras, and Five Nights at Freddy's camera monitor, the player will be able to switch between cameras in different locations to get information. Throughout the game, the player will switch between cameras and direct NPC to their destination.

  The background of the game is set in a futuristic world where the present human civilization is built upon the past human civilization that was destroyed by war. The present civilization worships the past civilization as their Gods and claiming themselves as the heir of God. Religion inside this world is considered to be the authority. The past civilization is much more advance in technology compared to the present one. Science and opinions are suppressed in this society, this makes them lack the knowledge to operate or recreate these ancient technologies from their Gods. 

Control:

Right Click to Select

Left Click to Chose Actions & Items
